text: @OliverDowden So nothing to do with: 12 April Cummings seen in Castle Barnard during lockdown. 2 days later, GlaxoSmithKline of Barnard Castle signed agreement to develop+manufacture a Covid-19 vaccine with Sanofi of France. Why cover that up, unless something dodgy going on? 🤔 childcare? Eh?

domain.name: Person

domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands
